# Best Bluetooth Speakers

July 1, 2020

![Best-Bluetooth-Speaker](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/07/Best-Bluetooth-Speaker.jpg)

When driving, if you don’t have music, you will feel very tired. Do you feel
this way? Like me, many people like to listen to music while driving! The
Bluetooth speakers are one of our best companions on the road.

So, the Bluetooth speaker is really a gift from God, we can put it in the car,
on the motorcycle, anywhere.

Today we recommend 10 Bluetooth speakers, they are all very good, you will
definitely like it.

## 10 Best Bluetooth Speakers 2020:

### 1\. JBL Flip 3

![JBL Flip 3](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/JBL-Flip-3.jpg)

The JBL Flip 3 is a versatile speaker in the Flip series that plays powerful
stereo sound in the room and outdoors.

It’s small enough to fit in your palm or bag, but it’s very strong.

In addition, it is as waterproof as most other JBL speakers, but you can’t
drown it underwater.

It has more than 10 hours of battery life, and 5 white led lights will remind
you of how much power is left.

Surprisingly, it also has noise and echo cancellation, which you can answer by
touching a button.

  *  __10 hours of battery life
  *  __Microphone has noise reduction
  *  __Can listen to obedience
  *  __Durable and durable

  *  __Waterproof is not very good

### 2\. JBL Charge 3

![JBL Charge 3](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/JBL-
Charge-3.jpg)

If you want a speaker that is both portable and has good sound quality, the
Charge 3 is definitely one of the best choices.

More importantly, it is completely waterproof! It looks more ordinary, but it
is very powerful.

At its bottom, there is a built-in bracket that is ideal for support.

In addition, in terms of transmission distance, it also performs quite well,
reaching 50~60 feet.

With it, you can play your favorite music as you like, and you can travel with
it, whether it’s raining or the sun.

  *  __Very good sound quality
  *  __Waterproof
  *  __Connection range is between 50 and 60 feet
  *  __Additional charger interface for power backup

  *  __You can’t go back to a previous song

### 3\. Anker SoundCore

![Anker SoundCore](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Anker-
SoundCore.jpg)

If you like to travel, then it will be perfect! It is not only easy to carry,
but also has a 24-hour battery life.

In terms of appearance, it is made of rubber and plastic, giving a feeling of
high quality products.

But it’s not completely waterproof, only the ipx5 rating, you can’t put it
below the water.

Most importantly, it uses Bluetooth 4.0 technology, is compatible with all
Bluetooth devices, and has excellent transmission distances and speeds.

  *  __Long battery life
  *  __Bluetooth 4.0 technology
  *  __66 feet Bluetooth range
  *  __Light and easy to carry

  *  __Bluetooth switching between devices is not automatic

### 4\. Bose SoundLink Revolve Plus

![Bose SoundLink Revolve Plus](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/07/Bose-SoundLink-Revolve-Plus.jpg)

Bose is known for quality, and SoundLink spin + is not disappointing. It looks
very beautiful, like an ornament!

In addition, it is available in white or black, most of which are covered in
aluminum and look very delicate.

Whether it is bass or treble, it performs very well, without mixing, and the
sound quality is clear.

Behind it, there is a charging interface that can be charged or used to
connect to other devices.

In general, if you are looking for superior sound quality, then SoundLink spin
+ is one of the best choices.

  *  __Built-in microphone
  *  __Handle makes carrying easier
  *  __Waterproof
  *  __Very good sound quality

  *  __Charger needs extra money

### 5\. UE Wonderboom

![UE Wonderboom](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/UE-
Wonderboom.jpg)

UE is a company specializing in designing Bluetooth speakers. They design
Bluetooth speakers with excellent quality and good waterproof performance.

Wonderboom is one of their masterpieces! It’s connected over 80 feet and is
completely waterproof so you can swim with it.

In terms of appearance, it has a unique shape that looks like a lantern, and
it has a variety of colors to choose from.

Whether it’s Bluetooth pairing or connecting to other devices, it’s very
simple and doesn’t even require an installation guide.

  *  __Completely waterproof
  *  __More than 80 feet of connection
  *  __Long battery life
  *  __Beautiful and stylish

  *  __Does not have an AUX 3.5 mm port

### 6\. OontZ Angle 3 PLUS

![OontZ Angle 3 PLUS](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/OontZ-
Angle-3-PLUS.jpg)

This is a super portable Bluetooth speaker. The most important thing is that
it has 30 hours of battery life!

In addition, its sound quality is also very good, and is waterproof.

It has a lot of features, but the installation is very simple, you can easily
pair Bluetooth or link to other devices.

Surprisingly, it can connect to all supported devices, including: iPhone,
iPad, smartphone, tablet, and more.

  *  __Very good sound quality
  *  __Long battery life
  *  __Waterproof

  *  __Not 100% waterproof

### 7\. Sony XB40

![Sony XB40](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Sony-XB40.jpg)

If you want a Bluetooth headset with high quality bass, the XB40 is one of the
best choices.

Sony’s bass quality is trustworthy, and the XB40 is not disappointing in this
regard!

It stands for extra bass, which gives a very clear sound even when the bass is
fully turned on.

In terms of waterproof performance, it is rated as IPX5, which is effective in
waterproofing, but it cannot be placed in water.

Disappointingly, this speaker has a very common appearance and a single
function. If you are just pursuing superior bass and don’t need extra
features, the XB40 is perfect.

  *  __The bass is very good
  *  __Long battery life
  *  __Can be used as a charging treasure

  *  __You must use the Sony Music app to control the speakers and lights
  *  __Not completely waterproof

### 8\. AOMAIS GO

![AOMAIS GO](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/AOMAIS-GO.jpg)

The AOMAIS GO Bluetooth speakers are rugged and look the way. With IPX7
waterproof rating, it is ideal for outdoor use.

Its 30W stereo allows the bass to pop up perfectly. It also comes with a TWS
feature that allows two speakers to be paired for a powerful 60W stereo
surround sound. The battery has an impressive capacity of 7,200 mAh and is
very fast charging.

Compatible devices are easy to use and can be connected to non-Bluetooth
devices via a 3.5mm jack.

The IPX7 waterproof feature is one of its best features because it allows the
speaker to be completely immersed in 33 feet of water for about 30 minutes. It
also prevents dust, snow, mud and rain.

Its clean and rich sound fills every room, and even when it’s outdoors, its
performance is amazing. It can also support karaoke with a 3.5mm external
microphone, so it will be the perfect backyard party.

Best of all, if the 30W volume is not enough, it can be paired with another
speaker to create left and right channels for powerful 60W stereo surround
sound.

  *  __Reliable quality
  *  __Long battery life
  *  __IPX7 waterproof rating

  *  __May be a bit heavy for girls

### 9\. Bose SoundLink Mini

![Bose SoundLink Mini](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Bose-
SoundLink-Mini.jpg)

Just because this speaker is small doesn’t mean it has to sound in that way.

It delivers a complete sound with a lower sound, which you can get from a
speaker that’s easy to put on your palm. Due to its wireless capabilities and
small size, it can be taken anywhere.

Built-in speakers let you make a clear call; your voice will be nice on the
other end.

It can be played for a few hours without plugging in and can be charged from
most USB power sources. The speaker remembers the last 8 devices used and
automatically reconnects them.

  *  __Bluetooth connection is very large
  *  __Long battery life
  *  __Wireless
  *  __Good bass

  *  __It would be better if there is a handle

### 10\. COMISO 30W

![COMISO 30W](//i0.wp.com/top5v.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/COMISO-30W.jpg)

COMISIO speakers are powerful, built-in 5200 mAh rechargeable battery, can
play up to 20 hours, built-in microphone Bluetooth speaker, hands-free
function.

It comes with a Bluetooth 4.0 speaker and a sound range of about 33 feet.

This speaker also remembers the 8 devices that have been used recently and
automatically reconnects to either of them.

A Bluetooth speaker is worth considering around the house, or you can choose a
more sturdy and easy to transport, you can take it out in a variety of outdoor
activities.

If you also consider advanced software that pairs and syncs your speakers
together, you’ll find it hard to create a mature sound system for yourself at
home or on the road.

  *  __20 hours of battery life
  *  __[Bluetooth 4.0 technology](https://www.cnet.com/news/bluetooth-4-0-what-is-it-and-does-it-matter/)

  *  __Long charging time

## Conclusion

We actually tested dozens of products, and there are many excellent Bluetooth
speakers that we didn’t list. The user feedback of these 10 products in the
list is very good, it is worth paying for him.

If you have a good recommendation, you can contact us or leave a message at
the back, we can communicate with each other.
